entry.title: Bitcoin Bounces Above $67,000 as Traders Navigate a ‘Liquidity Hunt’ Post-Surge
entry.summary: Bitcoin has steadied above $67,000, with experts predicting a retest of $70,000 as the U.S. election and upcoming NFP data shape market bias.

entry.title: Tudor-Jones Bullish on BTC, Dollar keeps Rising, GOAT hits $750M
entry.summary: All roads lead to inflation, own BTC: Tudor-Jones. Saylor plans to give away BTC ‘to civilisation’. India considering banning crypto for CBDC. Metaplanet raises $66m, likely to buy BTC. Peter Todd goes into hiding after Satoshi claims. SEC makes crypto examination priority in 2025. SOL again flips ETH for 24hr fees. AVAX release debit card for payments. Nigeria drops charges against Binance exec. Vitalik writes about future of The Verge for ETH. Buenos Aires builds decentralised ZK ID solution. Azura launches DeFi trading platform. Farcaster makes just $10k in October. LINK announces private transactions.

entry.title: Ripple CEO Says Kamala Harris Taking 'Nuanced' Approach to Crypto
entry.summary: Brad Garlinghouse painted Kamala Harris as a savvy Silicon Valley insider with a "nuanced" approach to crypto, while saying Donald Trump came out "aggressively" on the subject.

entry.title: GOAT Bot's Chat With Coinbase's Brian Armstrong Triggers Price Explosion in 'Russell' Meme coin
entry.summary: A seemingly casual exchange between Coinbase's Brian Armstrong and an online Twitter bot has sent one meme coin soaring.

entry.title: XRP ETFs 'Inevitable' After Bitcoin and Ethereum Approvals: Ripple CEO
entry.summary: Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse believes that an XRP exchange-traded fund will get approved by the SEC following recent filings.

entry.title: Character AI Imposes New Safety Rules After Teen User Commits Suicide
entry.summary: A 14 year old fell in love with a Game of Thrones-themed chatbot, then shot himself, in the latest incident to plague Character AI.

entry.title: Kamala Harris Whale Shakes Up Polymarket Election Odds With $2 Million Position
entry.summary: A newly registered Polymarket user backed Vice President Kamala Harris with $2 million, boosting her odds in the U.S. election showdown.

entry.title: Solana Meme Coin Factory Releases Video Feature, Immediately Goes Horribly Wrong
entry.summary: Pump.fun's new tokenized video feature was almost immediately misused to share child sexual abuse material, which has been removed.

entry.title: 'Tomarket' Reveals Airdrop Details as Telegram Game Tops 40 Million Players
entry.summary: Telegram game Tomarket has shared more airdrop criteria ahead of next week’s TOMA token launch on The Open Network (TON).

entry.title: Bitcoin Hitting $200,000 in 2025 Is a 'Conservative' Bet: Bernstein
entry.summary: Bullish Bernstein analysts now think Bitcoin will hit $200,000 per coin by the end of 2025—and say that's a "conservative" projection.

entry.title: Bringing Crypto's Global Community Together Through 'Immersive Theater'
entry.summary: HashKey Capital's Decode: Legacy experience is going on the road following its debut at Token2049. Decrypt's Liz Napolitano finds out how the immersive theater experience is helping to foster connections between crypto's diverse global community, through face-to-face interactions and problem solving.

entry.title: Here Is Today’s 'Major' Telegram Game Puzzle Durov Combo
entry.summary: Looking to complete Major’s daily Pavel Durov puzzle on Telegram? Here’s the solution updated on Tuesday, October 22.

entry.title: Here Is Today’s 'Tomarket' Telegram Game Daily Combo
entry.summary: Telegram game Tomarket is handing out free tomatoes and bonus items ahead of the airdrop. Here’s the combo for Wednesday, October 23.

entry.title: Here Is Today’s 'Captain Tsubasa: Rivals' Telegram Game Daily Combo
entry.summary: Anime soccer game Captain Tsubasa: Rivals gives out 5 million free daily balls ahead of the TON token airdrop. Here’s the combo for Wednesday, October 23.

entry.title: ‘Assassin’s Creed’ Maker Ubisoft Releases First Original NFT Game ‘Champions Tactics’
entry.summary: Ubisoft’s Champions Tactics: Grimoria Chronicles, built around NFTs on the Oasys network, is now available to play on PC.

entry.title: Vitalik Buterin: Michael Saylor's Bitcoin Self-Custody Comments Are 'Batshit Insane'
entry.summary: Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin has criticized the MicroStrategy co-founder’s recent remarks on crypto self-custody.

entry.title: Bitcoin Price Stabilizes as Analysts Flag an Accumulation Period
entry.summary: The market needs time to digest higher bond yields, "before Bitcoin can resume its upward movement," 10x Research wrote in a note.

entry.title: Blockchain.com Execs Face Scrutiny for Not Filing Accounts in UK
entry.summary: "We have sorted all necessary documents related to this entirely administrative matter," a Blockchain.com spokesperson said.

entry.title: Nigeria Releases Detained Binance Exec, Drops Charges
entry.summary: Nigeria has withdrawn its charges against Tigran Gambaryan and will release him, citing his poor health.

entry.title: Stable Diffusion 3.5: Stability AI Redeems Itself With New Models and Expanded Features
entry.summary: After its stumble with Stable Diffusion 3 Medium, Stability AI is back on track with Stable Diffusion 3.5, offering customizable models that are uncensored, fast, and accessible for everyone.

entry.title: Scroll Airdrop Farmers Gripe Over Ethereum Layer-2 Token Launch
entry.summary: Ethereum layer-2 network Scroll just launched its token—but like the recent Hamster Kombat airdrop, some recipients aren't happy.

entry.title: Elon Musk's Tesla Moved $776 Million in Bitcoin, But Is Still in Control of Wallets: Arkham
entry.summary: Electric car company Tesla moved its stash of Bitcoin last week, but data firm Arkham believes that Elon Musk's company is still holding.

entry.title: Anthropic Unleashes New Claude 3.5 Sonnet: A Model Smart Enough to Take Over Your Computer
entry.summary: The AI powerhouse just dropped major updates to its models, including a feature that lets its AI physically control computers, marking a shift from chat-only interactions to hands-on automation.

entry.title: Bipartisan Hope Grows That Crypto Laws Will Pass Before Year's End
entry.summary: Republicans and Democrats across the House and Senate are increasingly convinced that key pieces of crypto legislation could soon become law.

entry.title: GameStop Meme Stock Craze Prompted Market 'Plumbing' Changes, Says SEC Chair Gensler
entry.summary: The SEC embraced shorter settlement times after the GameStop short squeeze—but crypto already does 24/7 markets and quick trade completions.

entry.title: A $20 Alternative to Expensive Hearing Aids
entry.summary: Quantum Senses aims to offer an affordable and durable alternative to expensive hearing aids that's made from fully recycled materials.

entry.title: Everything You Need to Know Ahead of the 'X Empire' Telegram Game Airdrop
entry.summary: Elon Musk-themed game X Empire is launching its token on The Open Network this week. Here's what you need to know about the airdrop.

entry.title: SOL Outperforms, 10y Rises above 4.2%, AI Tokens Dominate flows
entry.summary: BTC: 67k (-2%), ETH: 2620 (-4%), SOL: 166 (0%). Top Gainers: APT, UNI, HNT, POPCAT, RUNE, KAS. BTC drops, SOL continues to outperform. PumpFun has sold $78m of SOL fees so far. Raydium flips ETH for 24hr fees. Scroll launches at $1.2bn FDV, disappoints. Crypto only really used for drug deals: Fed’s Kashkari. VanEck adds staking to SOL ETPs in Europe. LINK announces successful results from SWIFT trial. Brevan Howard trades most crypto from UAE. Japanese parties court crypto tax cuts. XRP co-founder donates $10m to Kamala. CFTC chair says agency is ‘handcuffed’ on crypto. Transak exposes 92k customers’ data. Sky may rebrand back to MakerDAO.

entry.title: SOL Breaks out, Stripe Acquires Bridge, GIGA hits $600M
entry.summary: BTC briefly tops $70k as OI tops $40bn. SOL outperforms, DEX volume eclipses ETH + L2s. SOLETH has highest weekly close ever. Pension giant L&G look to test tokenisation. BTC hash rate hits ATH. Stripe acquires stablecoin company Bridge for $1.1bn. PumpFun hints at upcoming token. GOAT drops then rebounds as authenticity questioned. GIGA hits new ATH of $600m, FROG hits $250m. MEW up 15% after Upbit listing. Jaypeg called out for misleading promotions. ACK editions sell for $290k.

entry.title: 'All Roads Lead to Inflation' Says Billionaire Bitcoin Bull Paul Tudor Jones
entry.summary: Billionaire investor Paul Tudor Jones is worried about U.S. federal debt—and sees inflation coming as a result. He's betting on Bitcoin.

entry.title: Should You Play 'Dookey Dash: Unclogged'? The Bored Ape Endless Runner With Big Prizes
entry.summary: REVIEW: Dookey Dash: Unclogged drops Bored Apes into the sewers for an endless runner with $1 million up for grabs. Here's our take.

entry.title: Stripe $1.1 Billion Bridge Deal Validates Stablecoin Growth, Says Bernstein
entry.summary: The Stripe acquisition of Bridge for a staggering $1.1 billion has underscored the growth of stablecoins as a payment method, says Bernstein.

entry.title: Crypto CEO Loses $450K to 'Best Friend' After Connecting to His WiFi
entry.summary: A ‘proximity breach’ is a rising trend, when someone exploits someone close to them to steal money—this time through a WiFi network.

entry.title: Meet HuggingChat: The Free Open-Source Chatbot That's Ready to Rival ChatGPT
entry.summary: HuggingChat offers fully open-source alternatives to everything the best chatbots have to offer, including custom assistants, model versatility, internet connection, and multimodality.

entry.title: Decentraland Launches Revamped Virtual World with Enhanced Performance, Engaging Features, and Future-Ready Architecture
entry.summary: Los Angeles, USA, 22nd October 2024, GamingWire

entry.title: Solana Protocol Elmnts Launches Tokenized Mineral Rights Platform
entry.summary: Energy market analytics company RBN Energy estimates that mineral and royalty interests amount to $700 billion.

entry.title: Mark Cuban Dismisses Polymarket Election Odds as Result of 'Foreign Money'
entry.summary: The billionaire isn’t the only one who has questioned the reliability of the crypto betting platform’s predictions in recent weeks.

entry.title: Michael Saylor Says He'll Give Away His Bitcoin—Like Satoshi Nakamoto
entry.summary: "Just like Satoshi left a million Bitcoin to the universe, so I’m leaving whatever I’ve got to the civilization,” the MicroStrategy co-founder said.

entry.title: Huge week for BTC ETFs, Crypto now through Venmo, Memes Dominate Gainers
entry.summary: BTC ETFs see biggest inflow week since July. BlackRock ETF sees $1bn inflows in a week. Venmo can now be used to buy crypto on Moonpay. SEC’s XRP appeal doesn’t challenge security status. Worldcoin rebrands to World with new orb. EigenLayer X account compromised. FBI arrests hacker of SEC X account. SCB in Thailand adopts stablecoins for transfers. DBS in Singapore adopts ‘token services’. Trump family to get 75% of WLFL revenue. Scroll team accused of owning sybil addresses. STX Nakamoto upgrade to happen next week.

entry.title: Majors Fall 1 to 2%, A New Tiger takes to the Charts, Van Eck teases Big Web3 Gaming
entry.summary: A lucky GOAT memecoin trader turned $5,000 into $1.5M during GOAT's run to $300M. A new memecoin based on Disney Park's new baby tiger "Bakso" was a top mover on Wednesday, running to $10M (now $6M). Crypto majors fall 1-2%, memes red across board. a16z calls 2024 crypto's biggest year yet in "State of Crypto" report. Vitalik publishes part 2 of blog outlining ETH's future. Van Eck teases big bet on Parallel and web3 gaming. Huge day for digital art with 4 marquee mints seeing success.

entry.title: Hamster Kombat Season 2 Teaser
entry.summary: Here's a first look at Season 2 of Telegram tap-to-earn game Hamster Kombat.

entry.title: BTC hits $68K, Trump odds Continue to Rise, GOAT nears $300M
entry.summary: BTC hits $68k as ETF inflows continue to soar. Open Interest at CME hits ATH, funding still low. Tesla moves $750m BTC to new wallet. Canary applies for Litcoin ETF, LTC up 8%. Grayscale asks SEC to convert altcoin fund to ETF. Kraken integrates with EigenLayer for restaking. ‘Network state’ Praxis raises $525m for new city. Trump project raises only $11m so far. a16z founders donate $2.5m to Trump PAC. TikTok accused of being crypto exchange in UK. Gotbit CEO arrested in Portugal. Perplexity AI launches finance platform.

entry.title: ETF Inflows Soar, Kamala Courts Crypto, TURBO Nears $1BN!
entry.summary: ETFs see $800m inflows in 2-days, huge volume. ETF inflows may be linked to Trump odds: CoinShares. Bitcoin will rival housing market as asset class: Fink. Vitalik proposes drop to 1ETH to become validator. Kamala reveals pro-crypto policies. Kamala mocked for linking crypto to race. Hyperliquid announces HYPE token coming. PUFFER airdrop claim goes live. Tether considering lending to commodities trader. Man takes $500m lost Bitcoin case to court. Google removes crypto prices from search. SUI Foundation denies $400m insider selling. UAE approves $AED stablecoin. Bitget wallet now only behind Binance for downloads.

entry.title: BTC hits 2-week High, China Stocks Rally again, GOAT hits $120M
entry.summary: BTC hits 2-week high as China stocks rise. SUI breaks into the top 15 coins. $1.3bn ETH might be sold from PlusToken scam. S. Korea may approve BTC & ETH ETFs this month. Australia launches first ETH ETF. Samara to buy BTC with $33m bond. Altcoins to see $500m unlocks this week. Vitalik writes blog on the future of ETH. Grayscale reveals 35 altcoins considered for funds. Ethena proposes SOL for USDe collateral. Only one Binance launchpad coin up this year. AVAX summit begins this week.

entry.title: Todd ‘revealed’ as Satoshi, Google may be Broken-up, Murad’s Wallets Doxxed
entry.summary: BTC will be range bound until election: Bernstein. TAO & memecoins dominate mindshare. Peter Todd ‘revealed’ as Satoshi by HBO. US government able to sell $4.4bn Silk Road BTC. Ireland unable to access $378m seized BTC. SOL could do 5x if Trump wins: StanChart. Coinbase integrates Taproot addresses for BTC. Canary Capital applies for XRP ETF. S. Korea to regulate stablecoin transfers. CryptoCom files countersuit against SEC. Babylon fills cap with 22k BTC. Scroll airdrop coming Oct 22nd. USDC goes live on SUI.

entry.title: Crypto Falls Ahead of CPI, Stripe Reinstates Crypto, Fed Charges Market-makers
entry.summary: Majors drop despite stocks hitting ATHs. Stripe reinstates crypto payments. Crypto settlements near $20bn in 2024. S. Korea to review ban on BTC ETFs. US charges market makers for market manipulation. FBI created their own coin to ensnare targets. Vitalik ‘outside pick’ for Nobel Prize. Trump family token to built on Aave stack. $16m OP tokens allocated to superchain users. Wisdomtree debuts debit card for on-chain fund. 47% of hedge funds have crypto exposure. Argentina overtakes Brazil for crypto inflows. Tucker interviews Ryan Salame over FTX.

entry.title: Bitcoin Bounces from $59K, Tesla unveils Robotaxis, Memecoins Outperform
entry.summary: BTC briefly dips under $59k, $160m liquidations. Mt Gox extends repayment plan by 1 year. Uniswap plans L2 for DeFi. SEC sues crypto trading firm Cumberland. Binomial sues SEC over futures trading. SEC’s Uyeda criticises agency’s policy. Justin Sun named prime minister of Liberland. MicroStrategy wants to become BTC bank. Binance pre-market trading goes live. Nearly 50% of US investors want crypto ETFs. Whale phished for $35m crypto. Ethena invests $46m in RWA funds. Trump’s crypto project aims to raise $300m.

entry.title: Decentraland Desktop Client Preview
entry.summary: Ethereum metaverse game Decentraland has shared an exclusive look at the visual and performance upgrades coming via its new desktop client.

entry.title: Crypto Trader Murad Mahmudov talks about the Supercycle and how he chooses Meme Coins.
entry.summary: Crypto Trader Murad Mahmudov talks about the Supercycle and how he chooses Meme Coins. Crypto stable, had sold off after China stocks fall. Crypto adopted faster than other tech: BlackRock. Crypto adoption to hit 8% of world population. CryptoCom recieves Wells notice from SEC. HBO documentary on Satoshi airs tonight. FTX bankruptcy plan approved by judge. Scroll airdrop may be imminent. Jupiter goes live on mobile iOS. Phantom rolls out support for Base. AAVE launches GHO on Base. Gensler may be replaced by Robinhood CLO. 87% of new token launches on SOL. National Bank of Bahrain creates BTC fund. BedRock DeFi allows BTC staking on ARB.

entry.title: Memecoins take off, funding stays low, China stocks keep on rising!
entry.summary: FOMO HOUR EP213. Memecoins take off, funding stays low, China stocks keep on rising! Many altcoins & memecoins soar despite stable BTC. Funding rates continue to be low or negative. Crypto funds saw $147m of outflows last week. BTC remains best performing major assets this year. SUI breaks into the top 20 coins again. TAO leads top 100 away from memes, sifu shorts. $100m bridge to SOL over the last 7 days. Metaplanet buys $6.7m more BTC. ETH proposal aims to improve throughput 50%. EIGEN, OP, APT lead token unlocks this week.

entry.title: How Walrus Protocol Unlocks New Applications for Decentralized Data Storage
entry.summary: Mysten Labs Chief Scientist George Danezis joined Decrypt to talk about its new decentralized storage protocol Walrus, which promises to unlock new applications such as AI and social media, thanks to its novel Red Stuff data encoding algorithm.

entry.title: Why Coinbase Sees Crypto as a Bipartisan, 'Purple' Political Issue
entry.summary: Coinbase VP of Corporate and Business Development, Shan Aggarwal, joined Decrypt's Sander Lutz and Liz Napolitano at Messari Mainnet 2024 to discuss the exchange's efforts to grow mainstream crypto adoption—and how the changing political conversation around digital assets is rapidly playing a major role in that.

entry.title: Binance Is Playing Offense—Not Just Defense—Against Crypto Crime, Says Head of Financial Investigations
entry.summary: Nils Anderson Röed, the exchange’s global head of financial investigations, sat down with Decrypt’s Sander Lutz at Messari Mainnet 2024 to discuss how Binance is proactively dismantling criminal networks around the world, the strategy with which the crypto exchange is approaching sensitive conflicts in the Middle East, and more.

entry.title: FOMO HOUR 212 - SEEDPHRASE TALKS ART!
entry.summary: Payrolls Higher than expected, Bitcoin reacts hard. Crypto sank early in the week as Middle East tensions spooked markets. Powell signals two more rate cuts this year. SUI leads L1s again, nears YTD high despite large unlock. Majority of FTX repayments still months away. EIGEN becomes non-transferable, hits $6bn FDV. SEC to appeal Ripple securities law ruling. Visa launches tokenization platform for banks. SWIFT plans digital asset trial in 2025. ByBit launched trading of global stock indices. SPX, GIGA & FWOG hit ATHs, most memes fall. XCOPY to release 250 piece collection on Shape. HBO documentary claims to have identified Satoshi.
